alert.note: Alert for Muscatine; Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 10:54AM CDT until May 20 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois...Iowa... Mississippi River at Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, and Dubuque. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Rock Island LD15. * WHEN...Until late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.5 feet, Water affects Le Claire Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 15.7 feet and slowly falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Saturday morning and continue falling to 13.1 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. The next statement will be issued this evening.
